organic.title: Pacific Heart, Lung & Blood Institute Is Dissolving
organic.snippet: The nonprofit organization PHLBI in Los Angeles is permanently closing its doors and preparing to donate its equipment and funding.

organic.title: The Pacific Mesothelioma Center, L.A.
organic.snippet: The Pacific Mesothelioma Center is a leading research and treatment facility dedicated to treating patients with lung-sparing surgery.

organic.title: The PACIFIC HEART, LUNG & BLOOD INSTITUTE - GuideStar Profile
organic.snippet: Established in 2002, the vision of The Pacific Heart, Lung & Blood Institute (PHLBI) is to rapidly develop innovative ideas into effective cancer therapies.
